message.content:
I need to identify the specific line item and value of the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period.

Looking at the financial statements provided:

1. The income statement shows "Cost of Goods Sold" which represents the cost of inventory that was sold during the period.

2. In the income statement, I can see:
   ```
   Cost of Goods Sold | 2018000.00 | 2024-02-05
   ```

3. This is the carrying amount of inventories that were sold during the reporting period.

The carrying amount of inventories sold is 2,018,000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '2018000.00'} }
```
